程序包 CourseMark

类 CourseManager

java.lang.Object
CourseMark.manager
CourseMark.CourseManager
public class CourseManager extends manager
CourseManager is responsible for managing courses, including adding, updating, and saving course information. It extends the manager class.

  • 构造器详细资料

    • CourseManager

      public CourseManager()
      Constructs a CourseManager object. Initializes the courses ArrayList and loads courses from the file.

  • 方法详细资料

    • addCourse

      public void addCourse()
      从类复制的说明: manager
      Adds a new course. This method should be implemented by the subclasses.
      覆盖:
      addCourse 在类中 manager

    • updateCourse

      public void updateCourse()
      从类复制的说明: manager
      Updates an existing course. This method should be implemented by the subclasses.
      覆盖:
      updateCourse 在类中 manager

    • getCourses

      public ArrayList<Course> getCourses()
      Retrieves the list of courses.
      返回:
      the ArrayList of courses

    • addCourse

      public void addCourse(Course course)
      Adds a new course to the list. Updates the course list and saves the changes to the file.
      参数:
      course - the Course object to be added

    • updateCourse

      public void updateCourse(int index, Course course)
      Updates an existing course in the list at the specified index. Updates the course list and saves the changes to the file.
      参数:
      index - the index of the course to be updated
      course - the updated Course object
